commitResults.messageTitle: Duke Class: change name and initial greet of Duke
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke class has some default greet behaviour and a default name.

The default behaviour and name do not fit the project requirements.

Changing the default behaviour and name will make the class adhere to project requirements.

Let's
* Change the name to Alfred
* Add the Initial greet as per project requirements

Duke class only had a Greet and Exit functionality.

Added Echo functionality to fit the project requirements.

Adding Echo Functionality will make the class adhere to project requirements.

Let's
* Add Echo method
* Abstract the existing greet and bye functionalities into methods for better code quality

Duke class only had a Greet, Exit and Echo functionality.

Added List functionality to fit the project requirements.

Adding List Functionality will make the class adhere to project requirements.

Let's
* Implement a list to keep track of user inputs
* Modify Echo method to echo out user input that was added to the list
* Create printList method to print the list upon user's request

commitResults.messageTitle: Duke Class: implement Mark as Done, unmark functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke class only had a basic to do list functionality.

Improved to do List by creating a Task Class to fit the project requirements.

Adding Task Class will improve code quality and readability.

Let's
* Implement a Task Class
* Update existing Duke class to incorporate Task Class

commitResults.messageTitle: Alfred Class: Create new subclasses for Tasks and their corresponding functionalities
commitResults.messageBody:
There are different kinds of tasks each with their unique kind of functionalities.

Creating these subclasses allows Alfred to be more robust and handle the different tasks as per the project requirements. Renaming Classes and Refactoring classes also improves code quality and readability.

Let's
* Implement a Todo, Event, Deadline subclasses
* Rename Duke class to Alfred
* Create a new package for seamless importing of classes

commitResults.messageTitle: Create semi-automatic testing for core functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
All testing is manual so far.

Creating semi-automatic testing scripts using input/output redirection improves code quality and reduces bugs.

Let's
* Update the given bash script
* Create a custom test case

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement error handing for most user input cases
commitResults.messageBody:
There are many invalid user inputs that the Alfred class cannot deal with.

Implementing Error handling improves code quality and functionality. Suitable error messages will instruct the user on how to correctly use the chatbot.

Let's
* Implement Alfred Exception Class
* Identify all possible invalid inputs and implement suitable error messages

commitResults.messageTitle: Alfred Class: Implement Delete functionality for the to-do list
commitResults.messageBody:
Alfred class is able to add, mark, unmark, view the to-do list but unable to remove entries from the list.

Implementing this feature will improve usability of the chatbot and will make it adhere to project requirements.

Let's
* Implement deleteList method and appropriate error handling
* Implement error handling for markList and unmarkList which was missed out in the previous commit

commitResults.messageTitle: Alfred Class: Implement TaskTypes using Enums
commitResults.messageBody:
Alfred class uses three types of Tasks: Todos, Deadlines and Events.

Using Enums will prevent accidental string comparisons that might lead to unpredictable behaviour.

Let's
* Implement TaskType Enum
* Update addList method to use TaskType
* Abstract out repeated functionality to reduce code duplication

commitResults.messageTitle: Alfred Class: Implement Save to Hard Disk Feature
commitResults.messageBody:
Alfred class creates a new todo list every time it is run and data is lost when it is exited.

Using local storage to store the data will allow an user to continue from where he or she left of improving the utility of the application.

Let's
* Implement addData method
* Implement processData method
* Implement error handling to create a new data file if data file is lost

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-7' Merge Commit: Merging Save Feature from level-7 into the master branch
Alfred Class: Implement Proper Formatting of Dates and Times
commitResults.messageBody:
Alfred Class stores dates and times as Strings

Storing date and time as Date Time objects will allow for easier parsing, easy comparison and improves code readability.

Let's
* Change all String representation of Dates and Time to LocalDateTime Objects
* Change the current Date and Time parsing to accommodate the LocalDateTime Objects.
* Add additional abstractions to improve code readability.

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement Ui, Storage, Parser and TaskList Classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Implemented more classes to abstract out all the functionalities further.

Abstracting into these classes will improve code readability, ease of debugging and reduce code complexity.

Let's
* Implement Ui, Storage, Parser, TaskList Classes
* Change Alfred class to now use these subclasses
